p: Some labdane diterpenoids, isolated from plant matrix, include the following: andrographolide ( Figure 9) (from Andrographis paniculata (Burm.f.) Nees) [ 211], labda-8(17), 12-diene-15, 16-dial (from Curcuma amada Roxb) [ 212], podoimbricatin C (a 12,17-cyclo-labdane diterpenoid from Dacrycarpus imbricatus (Blume) de Laub) [ 213] chapecoderins A-C (from Echinodorus macrophyllus (Kunth) Micheli), [ 214], (4R,5S,9S,10R)-13-des-ethyl-13-oxolabda-8(17),11E-dien-19-oic acid (from Juniperus oblonga M. Bieb) [ 215], leoheteronin D and leojaponin A (from Leonurus japonicus Houtt) [ 216], marrubasch A-F and marrubenol (from Marrubium aschersonii P.Magnus), marrulibanoside (from Marrubium globosum Boiss. and Balansa) [ 217], vitexlimolides Aâ€“C (from Vitex limonifolia Wall. ex C.B. Clarke) [ 218].
